statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the parallelogram above. Side lengths are measurements.

solution.p: Perimeter is the sum of the sides: \displaystyle{2}{\left({5.68}+{8.17}\right)}={27.7}\approx{27.7}.
Area is height times base (side perpendicular to height): \displaystyle{8.17}\cdot{4.82}={39.3794}\approx{39.4}.
